titles.title: To amend the National Historic Preservation Act to extend the authorization of appropriations for the historic preservation fund.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 5/20/2004--Introduced. Amends the National Historic Preservation Act to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Historic Preservation Fund through FY 2010.
